com.kaichunlin.transition

Interface ITransitionController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseTransitionController, CustomTransitionController, DefaultTransitionController

    public interface ITransitionController
extends java.lang.Cloneable
    Provides the actual implementation for a transition

    Created by Kai-Chun Lin on 2015/4/28.
